Header: Two Chinese caught with credit card forging machine
Content: Colombo (News 1st): Two Chinese nationals have been arrested in a hotel in Colpetty with a machine used to forge credit cards. Police have also seized 5 blank cards used for printing credit cards and a laptop. The suspects were arrested following a tip-off received from the Police Narcotics Bureau. The two suspects along with the seized items have been handed over to the Criminal Investigations Department for further investigations.
